column12:
'desc': [u'

Toppik Hair Building Fiber (25 g)

Toppik hair building fibers are all natural keratin hairs that bind to your own existing hair to instantly make your hair look fuller and thicker. Add hair to your hair. To apply toppik
column13: simply shake it gently over your thinning areas. In seconds
column14: thousands of tiny color matched hair fibers intertwine with your own hair. "Magnetized" with static electricity
column15: they bond so securely that they will stay in place all day and night. Durable and totally undetectable. Toppik won\'t come off in wind
column16: rain or perspiration. It is totally undetectable
column17:
even from as close as two inches. Toppik stays securely in place giving natural-looking thickness and fullness until the next time you shampoo. It is compatible with all hair products and is great for both men and women. \n
\n ']
